title: Add on option for the launcher
body:
Hi, i want ask to riot if they think to create a "pause" button in their  launcher.
When im downloading your game i need 4/5 hours in front of me to finished this.
So create a pause option to download LoL should be very interesting.
I hope everyone understand me and that riot watch my post.
TY

replies.body:
Hey Snoop Dodge,

As such, I'd like to direct you to the[ General Discussion Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/mNBeEEkI) and the [Miscellaneous Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) for posting your League of Legends related suggestions.
